parse.title: List of public art in London

text.*:
The Shaftesbury Memorial Fountain ("Eros"; Sir Alfred Gilbert, 1885), Piccadilly Circus, City of Westminster
ArcelorMittal Orbit (Anish Kapoor and Cecil Balmond, completed 2012), Olympic Park, Stratford, Newham

This is a list of public art in London, including statues, memorials, architectural sculptures and others, divided by London borough and the City of London.

The City of London and the 32 London boroughs
